title: Upgrading the PIR Registry System - May 2022
description:
Description
Management Summary
PIR is committed to improving the operational experience of our registrar channel and is
pleased to provide a registry upgrade scheduled to begin on May 31st 2022.
Description of Demand / Problem
PIR is committed to improving the operational experience of our registrar channel and is
pleased to provide a registry upgrade scheduled to begin on May 31st 2022.
Upgrading the PIR Registry System v1 FINAL.pdf
Acceptance Criteria
Alle automatisch bedienten TLD der entsprechenden NIC funktioniere unverändert - im Fall von PIR ist das die TLD ".org"
Checklist
Dependencies fulfilled (Ticket dependencies).
Accessibility / Barrierefreiheit: Principles fulfilled.
DoD: Verified by Scrum Master.
